about_the_game:
Background:

An ordinary person living in the 21st century on Earth is unexpectedly transported by a beam of light to a planet filled with magic and elements. He discover that the local inhabitants are struggling against alien invaders, and it seems he might be the key to resolving the crisis. Joining the native faction to fight the invaders appears to be the only option…

Features:

An indie single-player game

Light strategy card turn-based combat

Random event exploration adventure

Gameplay:

Four races with different talents for unique experiences

Card building with various styles for free combinations

Set equipment to make battles more powerful

Open endings with different choices leading to different paths

Developer’s Note:

We are a very small team, as you can count all our developers on one hand.

We are a very big team, as our primary goal is always to create an interesting game.

A true hero serves the country and its people. A great team serves the players!

Although our game still has many shortcomings and we face many real-world challenges, please believe that we are always striving. If this game can bring you moments of joy amidst the complexities of everyday life, that would be the best reward for us!

The game design is inspired by and has learned from “Slay the Spire” and “Balatro” and we have paid tribute to some games that accompanied us during our growth. We leave it to you to explore and discover these in the game!

  • Processor: intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: World of Elemental is an indie single-player card game. With four major races, different talents and traits, various playstyles, and over 100 pieces of equipment and items, you have plenty of choices. As long as you have enough strategy and wisdom, you will become the hero who turns the tide!
